stanza.line: Against my love shall be as I am nownow
With Time injurious hand crushed and oerwornoerworn
When hours have drained his blood and filled his browbrow
With lines and wrinkles when his youthful mornmorn
Hath travelled on to age steepy nightnight
And all those beauties whereof now he kingking
Are vanishing or vanished out of sightsight
Stealing away the treasure of his springspring
For such a time do I now fortifyfortify
That he shall never cut from memorymemory
My sweet love beauty though my lover lifelife
His beauty shall in these black lines be seenseen
And they shall live and he in them still greengreen
